idea-plugin.name: DSL API Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Generate binary compatible and Java interoperable DSL boilerplate code.
Based on Jake Wharton's blog on "Public API challenges in Kotlin".

Features

  • Interoperable with Java
  • Binary and source compatible
  • Generates comments

How to use?

  • Create an empty Kotlin file
  • Go to menu "Code" -> "Generate"
  • Choose "DSL API Generator"
  • Add propertys and types
  • Add a class name
  • Select "Generate"
